channel.title: Need a ::hide command?
channel.description:
I need a command ::hide and ::unhide
It has to make my mod+ invisible when they want :P
My source is deltascape

item.title: Need a ::hide command?
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“hide”) && playerRights >= 2) {

        sendMessage(

                "Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); 

        pHead = -100;

        pBeard = -100;	

        pTorso = -100;

        pArms = -100;

        pHands = -100;

        pLegs = -100;

        pFeet = -100;

        updateRequired = true; 

        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

    }

    if (command.startsWith("show") && playerRights >= 2) {	

        sendMessage(

                "Other players can now see you again."); 

        pHead = 3;

        pBeard = 19;	

        pTorso = 19;

        pArms = 29;

        pHands = 35;

        pLegs = 39;

        pFeet = 44;

        updateRequired = true; 

        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

    }[/code]

That is entirely ripped from runefreak10’s source. All credits go to him or whoever added the code into his server.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a ::hide command?
item.dc:creator: @Justin3 Justin_
item.description:
@Justin3 wrote:

[quote=“Hello RSPS, post:3, topic:334761”][quote author=ferasownz12 link=topic=431155.msg3165309#msg3165309 date=1269959155]
I need a command ::hide and ::unhide

It has to make my mod+ invisible when they want

My source is deltascape
[/quote]

I think that doesnt exist, and never will exist.[/quote]It actually does exist. My suggestion is to rip it from some source that has the command.
